descriptions: A Software Engineer Graduate Trainee at Iotra Digital Sdn Bhd, with hands-on experience in web development, game development, software engineering, PC building, and IT support.
Thank you for taking the time to explore my portfolio. Feel free to reach out using the contact information below.

expertise.title: Programming Languages
expertise.description: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, Go, Java, Python, PHP, PostgreSQL, MySQL, C#, C++

expertise.title: Application
expertise.description: Github Desktop, Unity, Unreal Engine 5, Blender, Krita, Microsoft Office

expertise.title: Hardware Related Skills
expertise.description: Build, service, and troubleshoot computer, Setting up IoT devices

samples.name: Pokedex Website
samples.description: A simple Pokedex (an encyclopedia for the video game series Pokemon) to practice Vue router and fetching data from an open source RestfulAPI.

samples.name: Forecast Website
samples.description: A website to display weather and waves forecast for surfing. I handled the front-end part only. The source code for this project is confidential.

samples.name: Data Entry Website
samples.technicalDesc: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, PHP, SQL
samples.description: A website created during my internship for the company's internal data entry system. I created the basic front-end and back-end for the website.

samples.name: Http Listener & Process Monitor Script
samples.description: A lightweight script to listen to webhooks from an IoT network server and another monitoring script that sends email if the listener failed.

samples.name: NakFit
samples.description: A 2d motion-controlled video game with for Noizucon 2024 convention booth. Players physically squat to move the character using.

samples.name: Blocks
samples.description: A 3d first-person video game with combination of action and puzzle elements. This project focuses on using Unreal Engine 5 and its physics engine.

samples.name: RPG Battle Systems Using Gyroscope
samples.description: My Degree's Final Year Project. A 3d action adventure mobile video game that implements gyroscope inputs from a smartphone device.

samples.name: Restaurant Menu System
samples.description: A simple menu system developed to practice Java Swing. This system allows users to browse the menu, add items to a cart, and simulate payments.

samples.name: Driving School System
samples.description: A simulation platform where students and teachers can sign in to manage driving school related processes including setting up schedules.
